Articles.Content:
On YouTube, I created a series which is about expansion of the Kerbal species to the planets. Its on sandbox and follows a near future space exploration and colonization.

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/kWfbuHf1BNQ?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

Goals:

Kerbin Sphere of Influence:

Establish Mun Base:Incomplete

Establish Network of Refueling Stations: Partially Complete

Establish Minmus Base: Incomplete

Visit Approaching Asteriod: Planned

Kerbol System:

Built a network of SENTINELS: Incomplete

Built Kerbol Station orbiting close to Kerbol: In Concept

Duna Sphere of Influence:

Create Cargo Vehicle: In Progress

Create Kerbal Transfer Vehicle: In Concept and Planning

Design Style 

![early-Innovative-Interstellar-Explorer-design-concept-Ralph-McNutt.jpg](https://www.tauzero.aero/wp-content/uploads/2012/10/early-Innovative-Interstellar-Explorer-design-concept-Ralph-McNutt.jpg)

or

![A91.jpg](http://www.nasaspaceflight.com/wp-content/uploads/2010/01/A91.jpg)

and many more

Please suggest what should I do next:D

**Edited <time datetime="2015-08-09T01:01:14Z" title="08/09/2015 01:01  AM" data-short="8 yr">August 9, 2015</time> by ouion**
